highlights: Leading a team that is creating a web application to display the performance of loan portfolios to Affirm’s internal business users and to perform ad hoc big data analysis; using React, Pyspark, and Flask
Developed big data pipelines to analyze millions of loans daily for financing; used Apache Spark and Python
Created a monthly data pipeline to collate large data sets on Affirm’s loans to send to Affirm’s backup servicer

Developed the PWM Equities trading platform for Regulation 10b5-1 plans as the lead developer; the application involved an automated order generation UI and service; used AngularJS and Java Spring Boot
Developed and supported the PWM Structured Note trading platform; used AngularJS, Java, and Slang
Created and maintained a large scale single-page web application; used AngularJS, Django, and PostgreSQL
Designed and created frontend statistics tools to help clients quickly analyze their data
Developed a web application build pipeline for automated deployment; used Webpack and AWS Code Build

publications.name: Storage filters upland suspended sediment signals delivered from watersheds
